name: The Grain Reaper
description:
The corn is rebelling!!!

🌽🌽 Take your scythe and teach the corn who eats who. Reap as many kernels as you can before the increasingly intense hordes of corn overwhelm you!!🌽🌽

Controls

🌽 Only keyboard controls are supported.

🌽 Tap SPACE to slash ahead of you

🌽 Hold SPACE then release for a larger, more powerful slash

🌽 Move with Up, Left, Down and Right or W, A, S and D

🌽 Press ESCAPE to quit

This was created in about 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam.
